segments.text: That boy is about to fall off that stool, and no one is stopping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this—it’s too dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn’t the woman turning around to see what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a recipe for disaster, and I feel helpless just watching it unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, making the floor even more slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t hurt himself when that stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step in and fix this before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
